main event: A dull red object approximately 1 1/2 x 4 feet in size was observed changing shape and converging with smaller round objects in Fox River Grove, Illinois on November 16, 1956.
interesting points: The object was seen hovering before rapidly accelerating to an estimated speed of 1000 m.p.h.,The sighting lasted about 10 seconds, with witnesses describing the object turning from dull red to bright red as it sped away.,The witness initially saw the object fairly far away and commented on its incredibly fast speed compared to an F-86 jet.,Witnesses noted that three small round objects appeared to merge into the larger object, creating a unique visual phenomenon.,The conclusion section suggests it could possibly be a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical object, but data was insufficient for a definitive evaluation.
sighted object: a dull red object changing shape
